li.a: Board of Education Goals and Objectives
NEASC Report - Coginchaug Regional High School

div.p: Through engagement in authentic learning all Regional School District 13 students are empowered to thrive and contribute as global citizens.

div.span: NOTICE: Board of Education meetings will be held remotely due to COVID-19. Public call-in information is posted below this banner.

div.div: Due to the current COVID-19 restrictions the Board of Education will be meeting remotely at 7:00 PM on 04/06/2020. The public can call in and listen to the meeting using the following phone and access pin:
Meeting ID: 979 6529 7145 (There is no participant ID)

div.span: Public comment will be serviced through emails sent to
. The received emails will be added into the meeting minutes.

div.div: Our new At-Home Distance Learning web page is now live! Please use the At-Home Learning link in the main navigation bar to reach the page.
ClassLink is accessed by going to http://my.classlink.com/rsd13
